I'm new to this whole piratebay thing... i was wondering if you could tell me what the symbols stand for? ...the pink and the green skull & bones, the mountain view and the magnet? you seem to have a handle for this so please edjucate me ;) love: Cami

Hi Cami, the pink and green skull with bone stands for trusted uploaders.
the mountain view tells that particular torrent got the cover or poster image.
magnet link is the new way of linking torrent files, even if the tracker is down or closed for registration you can still might be able to download the content of the torrent.
